title: Forager

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use one of your acquired items at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every night you are not targeted by direct visits, gain an item at random:
Gun deals basic attack.
Vest gives basic defense.
Smokebomb roleblocks target player.
- You cannot use the same item two nights in a row.
- You cannot receive an item and use one in the same night.
- You can give an item to another player. You will not receive an item this night.

desc:
Post 242
*You never understood why you could always find functional, useful items in your trash can. A blessing from the goddess of treasures, maybe?*
